boolean cake_can_load_maps()
This returns true if the data library can download the maps automatically from the Subversion server.

float character_range,
float character_weapon,
float character_bonus_damage,
float monster_defense)
Determines the expected HP damage for a single character attack against an opposing monster.
Determines the chance that the character is capable of hitting a monster.

This returns a formatted string with the exclusions from the provision’s locked slots.

float constant_value,
float percent_value)

int combat_frequency)
